name: Lantern of Inversion
description:
A strange place... strange writings on the walls... 

A glowing lantern which has the power to invert reality. What is the truth which lies between light and darkness, between rising and falling...?

[CONTROLS]
Left joystick: walk
Right joystick: snap turn
Grip: pick up items
Right grip long hold: summon lantern

Lucas Martinic - Programmer

Alex Bernstein - Programmer

Leon Kennedy - 3D Modeler

Jane Wei - Sound Design/Music
